titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for a voluntary program for prescription drug coverage under the Medicare Program, to modernize the Medicare Program, to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction to individuals for amounts contributed to health savings security accounts and health savings accounts, to provide for the disposition of unused health benefits in cafeteria plans and flexible spending arrangements, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-394, by Ms. Pryce (OH).
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 1 with 1 hour of general debate.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 136.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 463.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 463.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 204 (Roll no. 665).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 205 (Roll no. 666).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/21/2003--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 1 (Medicare Prescription Drug and Modernization Act of 2003).
